org.ektorp.android.util
Class CouchbaseViewListAdapter

java.lang.Object
  android.widget.BaseAdapter
      org.ektorp.android.util.CouchbaseViewListAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter
public abstract class CouchbaseViewListAdapter
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter

This class makes it easy to add a ListView to your application which renders output retrieved from a CouchDB view. Optionally, the changes feed for the database can be followed, triggering updates to redraw the view as the data changes.

Constructor Detail

CouchbaseViewListAdapter

public CouchbaseViewListAdapter(CouchDbConnector couchDbConnector,
                                ViewQuery viewQuery,
                                boolean followChanges)
Create a list adapter for the provided view, optionally following changes.

Parameters:
couchDbConnector - the CouchDbConnector to use
viewQuery - the ViewQuery describing the view to use
followChanges - true, if you want the list to be updated when the database has changes
